channel.title: How to Submit to Record Labels
channel.description:
Hey, all,
There’s been talk of “labels,” and I’m not sure everyone knows the “dos and dont’s” of submitting to record companies.
So, I have a little article by DJ Tech Tools that will help all of us.
http://djtechtools.com/2016/10/12/how-to-send-demos-to-record-labels/

item.title: How to Submit to Record Labels
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
I recall posting a couple of other articles on this subject previously, but couldn’t find them (in a very brief search). From the LANDR Blog, iirc.

 
Fwiw, there’s a thread where advice/tips/how-to articles like this can be brought together.

It’s pinned, but it’s worth bookmarking (in Discourse) too.

Post branding, distribution and marketing tips (links & embeds only) Branding & Distribution
Similar to the Post writing and production tips thread, this thread is for us to share found videos, articles, insights, analysis, etc… about branding, releasing, distribution, marketing, building audiences, profile/career promotion and development. …basically, the stuff that happens once you’ve finished the music. Anyone here can add a post, for any genre. (I’ll move some relevant posts from the other thread here.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to Submit to Record Labels

item.title: How to Submit to Record Labels
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Hey, all,

There’s been talk of “labels,” and I’m not sure everyone knows the “dos and dont’s” of submitting to record companies.

So, I have a little article by DJ Tech Tools that will help all of us.

DJ TechTools – 12 Oct 16

How To Send Demos To Record Labels - DJ TechTools

Producers: want to send demos to record labels and get a good response? JOOF label A&R manager Daniel Sokolovskiy reveals a few key insights.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Submit to Record Labels
